name: aidoc
description: AI-powered doctor appointment and symptom checker web application

scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend && npm run prepare:production
scripts.prepare:production: cd backend && mkdir -p dist/frontend && cp -r ../frontend/.next/static ./dist/frontend/ && cp -r ../frontend/public/* ./dist/frontend/ 2>/dev/null || true
scripts.lint: npm run lint:frontend && npm run lint:backend
scripts.test: npm run test:frontend && npm run test:backend
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install
